name: Hunter of Nightmares
description:
Story Flavor: You are an independent paranormal investigator hired to purge someone's home of a potentially dangerous haunting. Use your tools and knowledge of the paranormal to identify the TYPE of ghost you're dealing with and BANISH it using the ghost's ultimate weakness!

Features: Carefully search through a dark haunted house. Use ghost-hunting equipment to decipher what type of ghost you're dealing with. Evade the entity until you've located its weakness item. After discovering what ghost you're dealing with, use your knowledge as an expert ghost hunter to expel the entity for good!

Mechanics: Ghosts can be one of four types. You must search through random clues to discover this. Various ghost-hunting tools to measure clues. Run and hide from dangerous ghosts. Use special items/tactics to banish the ghost. Survive using tools that disorient and slow your pursuer. Banish the ghost by learning its nature from clues that you find.

  • Ian Elfont - Producer, Programmer, SFX
